title: Apriva to Speak at NFC Solutions Summit in Phoenix
text:
Bill Robertson to Present on Building Security and Flexibility into Mobile POS
Scottsdale, Arizona (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
Apriva, the leading provider of secure end-to-end wireless transaction and information solutions, today announced that they will be presenting on how to future-proof mobile POS systems during a speaking session at the NFC Solutions Summit , October 8, 2015 at the Arizona Grand Resort in Phoenix. Speaking on behalf of Apriva, Bill Robertson, director of core solutions, will be leading a session titled “Building Security and Flexibility into Mobile POS.”
WHO: Apriva’s Bill Robertson, director of core solutions. Also in attendance will be many market leaders, executives and management professionals from the financial services, security, retail, and government and identity solutions industries.
WHAT: Speaking session titled “Building Security and Flexibility into Mobile POS” examining how retailers can safely integrate the latest advancements in POS technology to serve their customers, enhance their return in investment and “future-proof” their systems to incorporate the latest technologies in payments.
Tickets and registration for the event can be purchased from the NFC Solutions Summit website: http://www.nfcsolutionssummit.com/register/
WHEN: The NFC Solutions Summit will be held October 7-8, 2015.
The session “Building Security and Flexibility into Mobile POS” will take place on Thursday, October 8, at 1:30 p.m. MST.
WHERE: The NFC Solutions Summit will be held at the Arizona Grand Resort at 8000 Arizona Grand Pkwy, Phoenix, AZ.
About Apriva
Founded in 1999, Apriva is the leading provider of end-to-end wireless transactions and secure information messaging solutions that meet the exacting security and reliability requirements of financial services providers, government entities, and public service sectors. Through its two operating groups, Apriva Point of Sale (POS) and Apriva Information Security Systems (ISS), the company offers customers fully-managed, end-to-end, security solutions that incorporate hardware, software, network infrastructure and management tools. For more information, visit http://www.apriva.com .
